description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Wolfsburg, home of the VW factory, and a model industrial city well provided with sports and recreation facilities; NATO ministerial conference at Bonn; Hamburg's 50th anniversary of the Overseas Club, and scenes of Lubeck; another Hanseatic city; and yachting at Kiel-Schilksee.
